features: 【Long Flexible Gooseneck & Long Service Life】: 360° long adjustable flexible gooseneck allows you to adjust your dimmable clamp light with ease and to direct the light wherever you want.The light board is made of high-quality aluminum, which has better heat dissipation and can extend the service life of the swing arm lamp ​up to 50,000 hours.

【3 COLOR MODES & 10 BRIGHTNESS LEVES】：This Dimmable desk clip lamp offers 3 color modes: warm light(2700K), warm white light(4500K), and cool light(6500K). Each lighting mode has 10 brightness dimming levels, Ideal for reading, studying, relaxing, working, thinking, relaxing, drawing, knitting, sewing, hobby, handicrafts, craftwork, study, dorm, etc.

【Eye-Caring and High brightness】: Our eye care light is composed of high-quanity lamp beads. No glaring, no flickering, no ghosting. Uniform brightness, soft light, large coverage, protect people's eyes who work and reading a long time from hurt. This desk lamp with clamp is provided enough brightness, which adopts an ultra-thin light bar and light board design, to make it has better light transmittance.

【Memory Function & Reliable USB Adapter】: The book light has a memory function, it will be on your previous setting when turning on again to catch your lighting preference. Our clamp lamps come with a 5V/2A adapter, which is more safe and reliable than another adapter. You don't need to purchase an additional adapter.
【What will you get】: 1x eye-caring desk lamp , 1x Metal Clamp, 1x Reliable Power Adapter(5V/2A), 1x User Manual.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #595 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement) #4 in Desk Lamps

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Stable Metal Clamp The desk lamp comes with a sturdy metal clamp equipped with an EVA foam cushion, capable of supporting desks with a thickness of up to 2.1 inches. The EVA foam cushion prevents the office lamp clamp from leaving marks and ensures a more secure attachment to the table. Switches Control Our lights are powered by USB, and you can power them using a power bank, computer, laptop, USB socket, or adapter. The desk lamp features 3 color modes, 10 brightness levels, and a CRI (Color Rendering Index) of over 90. Long flexible gooseneck The 360-degree adjustable long flexible metal gooseneck allows you to easily adjust your dimmable clamp light and direct the light wherever you want.
More Uses Are Waiting for Us to Dig Out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well and space saving
reviews.reviewText: It's perfect for working on my desk when lighting is low and I need a little extra light for where I work. Plenty of brightness setting, and 3 different light outputs. It also is out of the way and saves space on my desk. I could see myself using this for other activities as well. The lights have no hotspots eithers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surpassed my expectations
reviews.reviewText: This light is fantastic. The set up is very simple, and it is stable. It comes with three (3) types of lights, all with 10 brightness settings. You can point it in any direction you want, for any purpose you need. It can be bright enough to help you do delicate work, and soft enough to be a night light. You get tremendous value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars YES YES YES!!
reviews.reviewText: Finally I found a computer desk light that I love which has a small footprint. I needed a very tall one to clip onto the back of my monitor riser and still come up and over my rather large monitor, plus it's contemporary and sleek. The maneuverability of the arm/neck is unbelievably flexible; very easy to move & bend. I also like the fact that you can tilt the light strip section in two different directions so the light should never be in your eyes. Then there's the 3 different colors of light which is nice for daytime vs evening. I would definitely buy this product again and again!! Do it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just what I wanted!
reviews.reviewText: Its so seldom a product is exactly what you need, no more and no less. I needed a simple desk lamp that could withstand the cats' morning parkour sessions and provide plenty of light and that's what I got. Inexpensive and sturdy with plenty of light and nice dimming. Perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has been working great for me for months now.
reviews.reviewText: I often wonder about the longevity of some of these cheaper items from Chinese companies. However, this desk lamp has worked wonderfully for me for four months now. I make a lot of handwritten notes, and read printed materials from time to time for work. So, I purchased this to attach to my computer desk to provide extra light on those occasions. For that, it has worked perfectly. I like that I can adjust the brightness, for me about 75% works well. I also, like that I can choose the color temperature, I typically like a warmer color tone and set it there, but sometimes I need to extra focused so I set it to a cooler temperature (more like bright daylight) to help me stay focused and energized. The lamp clamps to my desk firmly and easily and the gooseneck is rigid and does not shake or wobble once set into position.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable, bright, and sleek!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a light for the corner of my living room that'd give off enough indirect light to be able to read a book on my couch. I was using Hue bulbs inside of lamps before, and it just wasn't enough light.I set up this flexible light on an end table and pointed it against some art and a geode I had - with some bending of the neck and tweaking, it became the perfect accent light for the room! Super bright for how compact the light is, I'm thoroughly impressed. The light is so sleek and minimal, it's like the lamp I never knew I needed. I never even turn on my Hue bulbs anymore, and have been really thinking about getting rid of the lamps around this section of the house to declutter and keep things really neat/minimal.I also love the fact it has 3 different colors. I mostly use it on the most "orange" (2700K) since it's easier on my eyes. If it's earlier on in the day, I may use the middle color which appears to be just natural white, or 4500K. Overall, this is probably the best and most used item I've bought in 2023, hands down!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my wife’s puzzle table. She loves the brightness and ability to adjust the hues. It’s clamped to the round underside of a card table and it is super stable. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous Desk Lamp does double duty
reviews.reviewText: Adore, simply adore this little, elegant clamp on desk lamp. It has all kinds of versatility. You can position it downward towards your desk, make a loop in it for a shorter angle (very long gooseneck), or even turn it around as fill lighting for your Zoom calls or videos. Also, you can adjust the brightness and the tint! Very sturdy. Wow. So glad I bought it.
